mapper.insert: INSERT INTO final.seller(user_no, seller_title, seller_author, seller_cont, seller_file, book_cost, seller_price, seller_date) VALUES (#{user_no}, #{seller_title}, #{seller_author}, #{seller_cont}, #{seller_file}, #{book_cost}, #{seller_price}, NOW());
mapper.update: update final.user set user_money = user_money - (select seller_price from final.seller where seller_no = #{sell_no}) where user_no = #{user_no}
update final.user set user_money = user_money + #{price} where user_no = (select user_no from final.seller where seller_no = #{sell_no})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO final.sellorder (user_no, sell_order_price, sell_order_date, sell_order_title, sell_order_img) SELECT #{user_no}, seller_price, NOW(), seller_title, seller_file FROM final.seller WHERE seller_no = #{sell_no};
